name: SeasonPark
summary: In this Game you follow the story of a man that is searching his wife and his kids. They all disappeared in an abondend indoor playground. This indoor playground is themed after the four seasons with its mascots named Sally Spring, Siggi Summer, Frederick Fall and Willy Winter. You need to break in this playground and explore it to find your children and wife ( with no keycards!!!). You get the help from your friendly winter stick. With that stick, you can create ice blocks on which you can jump on.
